ca.usask.simlab.odeToJava.util

Class FileSolutionReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.usask.simlab.odeToJava.util.FileSolutionReader

  • public class FileSolutionReader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class reads the time vector and the solution matrix from a text file.

    Each row of the text file consists of the time t followed by the solution vector at time t.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.lang.String filename
      The filename to read from.
      protected MatrixReader reader
      The class to use for reading.
      protected org.jscience.mathematics.vectors.Float64Matrix solution
      The solution values that have been read.
      protected org.jscience.mathematics.vectors.Float64Vector time
      The times that have been read.

    • Method Detail

      • get_solution

        public org.jscience.mathematics.vectors.Float64Matrix get_solution()
        Return the solution in matrix.

        Each row of the matrix is a solution vector at a particular time.

        Returns:
        The solution values as a matrix.

      • get_time

        public org.jscience.mathematics.vectors.Float64Vector get_time()
        Get the time vector.
        Returns:

      • readSolution

        public void readSolution()
                  throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                         java.io.IOException
        Read the time vector and the solution from the file.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - The file does not exist.
        java.io.IOException - There was an I/O error reading the file.
